item.name: eAPI (JSON-RPC)

response.name: Success: text format

            "output": "Arista vEOS

response.name: Failure: invalid creds
response.body: Unable to authenticate user: Bad username/password combination

response.name: Failure: invalid command
Failure: non-priv access

body.raw:
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "runCmds",
    "params": {
        "format": "json",
        "timestamps": true,
        "autoComplete": false,
        "expandAliases": false,
        "cmds": [
            "configure terminal",
            "interface Loopback0",
            "description TEST FROM EAPI",
            "ip address 192.0.2.1/32"
        ],
        "version": 1
    },
    "id": "postman"
}

response.name: Failure: not in config mode
Success: with loopback
